hero.title: Wear the passion, live football!
hero.description: Discover our exclusive collection of football jerseys with premium quality, unique designs, and unbeatable prices. Perfect for every football fan.
hero.subtitle: Discover our exclusive collection of football jerseys. Premium quality, unique designs, and unbeatable prices.

trust.title: Over 1200 Happy Customers ‚≠êÔ∏è
trust.subtitle: Our community of enthusiasts grows every day. Join those who have already chosen quality and authenticity.

quality.title: Super Quality
quality.description: Our jerseys are crafted with attention to detail using premium materials. Perfect for true fans who want to collect emotions, not just fabric.

unique.title: Unique Models
unique.description: Exclusive collection of rare and limited edition jerseys. Find unique pieces you won't find anywhere else.

fit.title: Perfect Fit
fit.description: Each jersey is designed to ensure maximum comfort and impeccable fit. Accurate sizes and materials that adapt perfectly to the body.

features.title: Guaranteed Reliability ‚úÖ
features.subtitle: Your satisfaction is our priority. That's why we offer services that guarantee a safe and worry-free shopping experience.

secure.title: Secure Payments
secure.description: We guarantee risk-free transactions, putting your security first. You can shop with confidence, knowing that every transaction is handled with reliable and maximum security systems.

guarantee.title: 7-Day Guarantee
guarantee.description: With our 7-day guarantee, we offer peace of mind to try your purchase without worries. If for any reason you're not completely satisfied, you have 7 days to return the product and get a full refund.

returns.title: Free Returns
returns.description: We offer free returns to ensure every purchase meets your expectations. If for any reason you want to return your product, return it within 7 days and enjoy a return without additional costs.

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.description: Every purchase offers the peace of mind of a fully trackable order. To do this, simply enter the package number we will provide on the 'Track Your Order' page!

mysteryBox.description: Discover the magic of our mystery boxes! Each box contains a surprise jersey from the best Italian and international teams.

process.step3: Receive your mystery box with a premium quality surprise jersey!

questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.answer: Your wait will be short! It usually takes 10-14 days to arrive at your home. You can check your order status in the 'Track Your Order' section!

questions.question: Are payments secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. The security of your payments is our top priority. We use secure and reliable payment systems to ensure a worry-free transaction.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: Purchases on our site can be made via: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Maestro, and PayPal. We do not accept cash, check, cash on delivery, or bank transfer. Every purchase is made with maximum security to protect your personal and credit card information from unauthorized access.

questions.question: How is the product quality?
questions.answer: The quality of our product is excellent. We take great care in selecting materials and in the production process to ensure that every item meets the highest standards.

questions.question: Is there a guarantee?
questions.answer: Of course! If the product arrives damaged or different from what you expected, contact us at 'goalmaniaofficial@gmail.com'. We will reply as soon as possible!

questions.question: Do you accept returns?
questions.answer: Certainly! We accept returns within a maximum period of 7 days from the date of purchase. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we want to ensure that every customer is happy with their purchase.
